title: Anyone have a VG/VGEX Waddell Old Mill?
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Anyone have a VG/VGEX Waddell Old Mill?
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Working on the backs line and trying to fill each slot without duplicating HOFers. Ideally Waddell could fill the OM spot. Doubt I could afford a portrait, but throwing seems to be a little easier to come by. If anyone has one for sale or trade, hit my up on the PM.

No Australians or cousins uncles, please.

Thanks,
Bob
